column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our group of 5 came here for dinner and it was my first time here
column2: I instantly fell in love. The setting was beautiful
column3: it was romantic and the lights were dimmed. Love the variety of food and they were tapas style! Fun little dinner party place. We order red wine and a few of everything on the menu
column4: the beef skewers and blue cheese were my favorite. I could've ate 5 more orders of it! yum! Can't wait to go back!
